author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FLOSSIE STRENGTHENS INTO A HURRICANE OFFSHORE SOUTHWEST MEXICO...
summary: ...FLOSSIE STRENGTHENS INTO A HURRICANE OFFSHORE SOUTHWEST MEXICO... As of 03:00 UTC TUE JUL 01 2025 the center of Flossie was located near 16.5, -104.3 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 988 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FLOSSIE STRENGTHENS INTO A HURRICANE OFFSHORE SOUTHWEST MEXICO... As of 03:00 UTC TUE JUL 01 2025 the center of Flossie was located near 16.5, -104.3 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 988 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Flossie (EP1/EP062025)
